qas.question: Which nationality was the hacker who acquired I3enc?
What did the hacker use to acquire the software?
The hacker re-wrote which element of the program?
How much did the new released program by the hacker cost?

context: As <a0_0>sound scholar<a0_0/> Jonathan Sterne notes, "An <a1_0>Australian<a1_0/> hacker acquired l3enc using a <a2_0>stolen credit card<a2_0/>. The hacker then reverse-engineered the software, wrote a new <a3_0>user interface<a3_0/>, and redistributed it for <a4_0>free<a4_0/>, naming it "thank you Fraunhofer"".
